verses.verse: And in that<WH1931> day<WH3117> seven<WH7651> women<WH802> shall take hold<WH2388> of one<WH259> man,<WH376> saying,<WH559> We will eat<WH398> our own bread,<WH3899> and wear<WH3847> our own apparel:<WH8071> only<WH7535> let us be called<WH7121> by thy name,<WH8034> to take<WH622> away our reproach.<WH2781>

In that<WH1931> day<WH3117> shall the branch<WH6780> of the LORD<WH3068> be<WH1961> beautiful<WH6643> and glorious,<WH3519> and the fruit<WH6529> of the earth<WH776> shall be excellent<WH1347> and comely<WH8597> for them that are escaped<WH6413> of Israel.<WH3478>

And it shall come to pass,<WH1961> that he that is left<WH7604> in Zion,<WH6726> and he that remaineth<WH3498> in Jerusalem,<WH3389> shall be called<WH559> holy,<WH6918> even every one<WH3605> that is written<WH3789> among the living<WH2416> in Jerusalem: <WH3389>

When <WH518> the Lord<WH136> shall have washed away<WH7364> <WH853> the filth<WH6675> of the daughters<WH1323> of Zion,<WH6726> and shall have purged<WH1740> the blood<WH1818> of Jerusalem<WH3389> from the midst<WH4480> <WH7130> thereof by the spirit<WH7307> of judgment,<WH4941> and by the spirit<WH7307> of burning.<WH1197>

And the LORD<WH3068> will create<WH1254> upon<WH5921> every<WH3605> dwelling place<WH4349> of mount<WH2022> Zion,<WH6726> and upon<WH5921> her assemblies,<WH4744> a cloud<WH6051> and smoke<WH6227> by day,<WH3119> and the shining<WH5051> of a flaming<WH3852> fire<WH784> by night:<WH3915> for<WH3588> upon<WH5921> all<WH3605> the glory<WH3519> shall be a defense.<WH2646>

And there shall be<WH1961> a tabernacle<WH5521> for a shadow<WH6738> in the daytime<WH3119> from the heat,<WH4480> <WH2721> and for a place of refuge,<WH4268> and for a covert<WH4563> from storm<WH4480> <WH2230> and from rain.<WH4480> <WH4306>
